definition: to draw/picture/painting/CL:幅[fu2],張|张[zhang1]/classifier for paintings etc/variant of 劃|划[hua4]
cloth/to declare/to announce/to spread/to make known

sentences.english: There were no canvases and children adapted to local production.
sentences.chinese: 这没有油画布孩子们适应了当地的产品。

sentences.english: The painter swept a brush over his canvas.
sentences.chinese: 画家的画笔在画布上飞掠。

sentences.english: The pianos act as a blank canvas for everyone else's creativity.
sentences.chinese: 这些街头钢琴是一块油画布，任每个人发挥其创意。

sentences.english: The artist is exploring the probability of "paint" on the canvas with cotton thread.
sentences.chinese: 在油画布上以刺绣棉线作画，并把数学曲线作为形象。

sentences.english: Preparing the canvas for painting with acrylics involves applying a layer of gesso on the surface as a foundation.
sentences.chinese: 准备压克力画在画布上应用涉及面为基础的石膏层。

sentences.english: It gathers 12 of her latest canvasses in middle and small format.
sentences.chinese: 它搜集啦12个最新地画布中小格局。

sentences.english: They are like an empty canvas, waiting to be filled with knowledge andexperiences.
sentences.chinese: 他们就像一张空白的画布，等待知识和经验的填充。

sentences.english: For starters, is the canvas lined?
sentences.chinese: 首先，画布是有衬里的么？

sentences.english: Blobs of paint were dotted around the canvas.
sentences.chinese: 他用颜料在油画布上点了许多小点。

sentences.english: He painted out the ends of the stripes, so that they appear to stop where the canvas stops.
sentences.chinese: 他描出了线条的终点，使之看起来结束在画布边缘。

sentences.english: Usually I work with oil or acrylic on canvas and also create digital art.
sentences.chinese: 我经常在画布上画油画和丙烯画，也有数字艺术作品。

sentences.english: I understand it's often faster to pre-render graphics to an off-screen canvas.
sentences.chinese: 我明白这是通常更快的预渲染的图形的一个屏幕画布。

sentences.english: Toys are like canvas, they are the physical representation of the monsters i draw.
sentences.chinese: 公仔就像是画布，可以具体呈现我画的怪物们。

sentences.english: I guess the difference between this and open canvas is that this is more linear.
sentences.chinese: 我想它跟开放画布的不同就是它更线性化。

sentences.english: You could just go out and buy a ready-made blank canvas.
sentences.chinese: 你完全可以出去买一张现成的空白画布了事。

sentences.english: If you’re a painter, start the broad strokes on the canvas.
sentences.chinese: 如果你是一个画家，开始在画布上尽情勾勒吧。

definition: brush stroke in Chinese painting and calligraphy/brushwork/style of drawing or writing
to draw/picture/painting/CL:幅[fu2],張|张[zhang1]/classifier for paintings etc/variant of 劃|划[hua4]
fine writing paper, originally from Jing county 涇縣|泾县, Xuancheng 宣城, Anhui
